object.name: deleteStory
object.description: Deletes a story previously posted by the bot on behalf of a managed business account. Requires the can_manage_stories business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Deletes a story previously posted by the bot on behalf of a managed business account. Requires the can_manage_stories business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Deletes a story previously posted by the bot on behalf of a managed business account. Requires the *can_manage_stories* business bot right. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the story to delete
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the story to delete
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the story to delete
annotations.name: story_id
